title: Beef & Cucumber Salad
description: This is very light, juicy and simply delicious beef salad.
story: I take a flank steak for this and it works just fine: I cut meat in thin long slices against the grain and fry them on the hot pan. Another option I've tried - New York steak: grilled medium to well and then sliced.</br></br>This salad is really juicy and you can make it as hot as you like.
instructions: Cut beef in ribbons, marinade in some soy sauce, finely chopped garlic clove and some ginger.
Fry beef on high heat for a couple of minutes.
Make ribbons out of cucumber with a potato peeler.
Cook rice noodles as instructions on a packaging suggest, rinse under the cold water.
And season with sweet & sour thai sauce mixed with fish sauce and lime juice.
Sprinkle with some chopped fresh coriander (if you are a fan).
